description: OpenSSL 0.9.8p is vulnerable to multiple cryptographic weaknesses including predictable random number generation (CVE-2008-0166) and certificate forgery (CVE-2005-2946). This outdated version lacks modern security fixes and should be upgraded immediately.
code_snippet:
Package: libopenssl
Version: 0.9.8p-1
Depends: libc, zlib
Provides:
Status: install ok installed

description: Linux kernel 3.10.20 contains multiple unpatched vulnerabilities including remote code execution via ICMP (CVE-2016-3707) and privilege escalation vulnerabilities (CVE-2017-1000253). The kernel version is critically outdated.

code_snippet:
Package: dnibusybox
Version: 1.4.2-2
Depends: libc
Provides:
Status: install ok installed

Package: iptables
Version: 1.4.21-1
Depends: libc, kmod-ipt-core, libip4tc, libip6tc, libxtables

description: cURL 7.29.0 contains multiple known vulnerabilities including protocol stream confusion and SSL verification weaknesses. This version should be upgraded.
code_snippet:
Package: curl
Version: 7.29.0-1
Depends: libc, libcurl
Provides:
Status: install ok installed
